name: HeroBillboardCarousel
description: Full-width hero section with centered text and 5+ auto-scrolling images in carousel layout.

description.example: Browse through our collection of projects

mediaItems.example: [{ imageSrc: '/img1.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 1' }, { imageSrc: '/img2.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 2' }, { imageSrc: '/img3.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 3' }, { imageSrc: '/img4.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 4' }, { imageSrc: '/img5.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 5' }]
mediaItems.note: Array of 5+ MediaItem objects. Each item can have imageSrc, videoSrc, imageAlt, videoAriaLabel. Requires minimum 5 images.

structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs (https://, http://, www.) open in new tab. Internal values (e.g., 'about', 'contact') scroll to #about, #contact sections
structure.props: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant> - Additional button props like className, textClassName (optional)

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius is controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius (options: 'sharp', 'rounded', 'soft', 'pill'). All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level to maintain consistent styling across the entire site.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.mediaItems: Array<{ imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }> - Each item requires either imageSrc or videoSrc

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="rounded">
  <HeroBillboardCarousel 
    title="Our Portfolio" 
    description="Browse through our collection of projects" 
    tag="Portfolio" 
    mediaItems={[
      { imageSrc: '/img1.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 1' },
      { imageSrc: '/img2.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 2' },
      { imageSrc: '/img3.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 3' },
      { imageSrc: '/img4.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 4' },
      { imageSrc: '/img5.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 5' },
      { imageSrc: '/img6.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 6' },
      { imageSrc: '/img7.jpg', imageAlt: 'Product 7' }
    ]}
    buttons={[{ text: 'View Portfolio', href: 'https://example.com' }, { text: 'Contact Us', href: 'contact' }]} 
  />
</ThemeProvider>
dont: Do not use less than 5 items
